#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define s(x) scanf("%lld", &x)
using namespace std;
#define MAX 500009
 
long long int a[MAX], b[MAX], c[MAX], ans[MAX];
 
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	long long int mn,t,i,j,k,n,pos,no,z;
	
	s(t);
	
	while (t--) {
		s(n);
		
		for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)
			s(a[i]);
		
		for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)
			s(b[i]);
		
		s(k);
		
		for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
			z = max(k-a[i], (long long int) 0);
			no = (z)/(a[i]-b[i]);
			
			if ((z) % (a[i]-b[i]) != 0)
				++no;
			
			c[i] = no*(a[i]+b[i]);
			
			c[i] += k-(no*(a[i]-b[i]));
			
			if (i == 0) {
				mn = c[i];
				pos = i;
			}
			
			if (c[i] < mn) {
				mn = c[i];
				pos = i;
			}
		}
		
		printf("%lld\n", pos+1);
	}
	return 0;
}
